ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] all I can say is hmmmm
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t understand how e-bay relates to characters moving between accounts or servers.  You see e-bayers now, how will the number of ebayers you see change?
ygData.messageBody:
I don't understand how e-bay relates to characters moving between
accounts or servers. You see e-bayers now, how will the number of
ebayers you see change?

Shada/Erisi

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
Sent: Friday, July 06, 2001 9:36 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] all I can say is hmmmm


Seems to me that with what they are charging - it's going to be a
"profit
center" for Verant. I'm concerned that Bards will be the type of
character
where we'll see significant E-Bay'ers. I expect to see a lot of bards
in SS
and POG armor with no idea how the songs work - let alone twisting.
